4. Digits in a large numbe


s = ''

numstring = s.strip().replace('\n', '')
greatest_product = 0

for i in range(len(numstring)):
    product = 1
    substring = numstring[i:i+13]
    for digit in substring:
        product *= int(digit)
    if product > greatest_product:
        greatest_product = product

print(greatest_product)


OUTPUT
--------------------************--------------
					23514624000
--------------------************--------------

5. Powered Sequence

L = 1000    
d = 10**10
s = sum(pow(n, n) for n in range(1, L+1)) 

print ("Project Euler 48 Solution = %d" % (s % d))

OUTPUT
--------------------************--------------
					9110846700
--------------------************--------------

6. Multiple permutations 

f = lambda n:sorted(str(n))
n = 99999
while not f(n*2) == f(n*3) == f(n*4) == f(n*5) == f(n*6): n += 9

print ("Project Euler 52 Solution =", n)


OUTPUT
--------------------************--------------
					142857
--------------------************--------------
